seed_pair.target: Esta es la única manera en que funcionará.
seed_pair.known: This is the only way it will work.

S0084: No estoy de acuerdo con lo que dijo sobre mi amigo.
I don't agree with what he said about my friend.
S0087: They are people I don't know.
S0088: No estoy preparado para hablar con personas que no conozco todavía.
I'm not ready to talk to people I don't know yet.
S0089: Pienso que he hecho mucho en un breve tiempo.
I think that I've done a lot in a short time.
S0090: Si puedes hablar más lentamente, eso sería excelente.
If you can speak more slowly that would be great.
S0091: Es difícil pensar lo suficientemente rápido para responder a tiempo.
It's difficult to think quickly enough to answer in time.
S0092: Me gustaría continuar haciendo esto por un tiempo.
I'd like to keep on doing this for a while.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
